INSERT INTO ORDER_TBL (ODR_CODE, MEM_ID, ODR_NAME, ODR_ZIPCODE, ODR_ADDR, ODR_ADDR_D, ODR_PHONE, ODR_TOTAL_PRICE, ODR_MESSAGE, PAYMENT_STATUS) VALUES (#{odr_code}, #{mem_id}, #{odr_name}, #{odr_zipcode}, #{odr_addr}, #{odr_addr_d}, #{odr_phone}, #{odr_total_price}, #{odr_message}, #{payment_status})
